WITH LIST AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY $sortColumn$ $sortDirection$) AS ROWNUMBER, A.isbn, A.Thumbnail, F.NAME AS CATEGORYROOT, E.NAME AS CATEGORYSUB, D.NAME AS CATEGORY, A.TITLE, G.DeptName, C.UserRname, B.startDate, B.endDate, B.returnDate FROM Minwork.dbo.BookInfo A INNER JOIN Minwork.dbo.BookRental B ON A.ISBN = B.ISBN INNER JOIN Minwork.dbo.UserInfo C On B.userId = c.userId INNER JOIN BOOKCATEGORY D ON A.CATEGORY = D.ID INNER JOIN BOOKCATEGORYSUB E ON D.SUB_ID = E.ID INNER JOIN BOOKCATEGORYROOT F ON E.ROOT_ID = F.ID INNER JOIN Minwork.dbo.DeptInfo G ON G.deptid = C.deptCode
) SELECT * FROM LIST WHERE ROWNUMBER BETWEEN #startRow# AND #endRow#

SELECT COUNT(A.isbn)
FROM Minwork.dbo.BookInfo A INNER JOIN Minwork.dbo.BookRental B ON A.ISBN = B.ISBN INNER JOIN Minwork.dbo.UserInfo C On B.userId = c.userId INNER JOIN BOOKCATEGORY D ON A.CATEGORY = D.ID INNER JOIN BOOKCATEGORYSUB E ON D.SUB_ID = E.ID INNER JOIN BOOKCATEGORYROOT F ON E.ROOT_ID = F.ID INNER JOIN Minwork.dbo.DeptInfo G ON G.deptid = C.deptCode
